settings.heading: I want you to remember this: I will always take the lead.

settings.text:
With over a decade in business, I have tried hundreds of tools, applications, and services, so I know what works and what doesn't. Thus, I am happy to provide genuine advice on what you need (and when you need it) for you to start a successful business that you truly enjoy.

Please note, I personally use these tools in my business and that's why I am excited to share them with you. Click on the link below to check them out, and if you choose to use them for your business I'll earn a small commission as an affiliate. Thank you.

settings.title: Free Guides:
settings.description: I personally created these guides for you and share them at zero cost because I sincerely want you to know you're capable to start an online business just like me and million of other women.

settings.title: Shopify E-commerce builder
settings.text: I have teamed up with Shopify to offer you a 3-day free trial, and 1 month for only $1usd on select plans. Simply follow the link to sign up. Reach out to me with any questions!

settings.title: Flodesk Email marketing
settings.text: I love Flodesk for my email marketing. If you’re not using it right now, sign up with my affiliate link to get 50% off your first year and get their link in bio feature completely free.

settings.title: Popl: Digital Business Card
settings.text: Say good bye to paper business cards! Embrace the digital Era with Popl. Digital cards are eco-friendly, cost-effective and incredibly efficient.

settings.title: Dashlane Password management
settings.text: Still writing all your passwords on a paper or notes on your phone? There is a new and safer way to store all your passwords in a safe "vault".
Be the first to know about new collections and exclusive offers.
